In a world where time travel has become possible, a group of scientists have discovered a way to send animals through time. However, they soon realize that the animals are not just simple observers, but are actually influencing the course of history in unexpected ways. One of the animals, a time-traveling bunny named Benny, has become a sort of "wild card" in the timestream, causing chaos and confusion wherever he goes. As Benny hops through different eras, he inadvertently changes the course of events, leading to alternate timelines and paradoxes. The scientists must now track down Benny and contain him before he causes any more damage to the fabric of time itself.

In a post-apocalyptic world, a group of survivors must navigate the ruins of a once-great city. One of the survivors, a young woman named Ava, discovers a strange artifact that allows her to see glimpses of the past. As she explores the ruins, she begins to uncover a hidden history of the city, revealing secrets and lies that have been buried for decades. But Ava soon realizes that she is not alone in her quest for knowledge - a mysterious figure, known only as "The Archivist," is also searching for the truth, and will stop at nothing to claim the artifact for themselves.

In a world where magic has been outlawed, a group of rebels must use their magical abilities in secret to fight against the oppressive government. One of the rebels, a young man named Eli, has the ability to communicate with animals, and discovers that a group of magical creatures are being hunted by the government. Eli must use his powers to help the creatures escape, while also navigating the complex web of alliances and rivalries within the rebel group.

In a world where memories can be transferred from one person to another, a group of "memory thieves" must navigate the black market of memories. One of the thieves, a young woman named Lena, discovers a memory that contains a powerful secret - the location of a hidden treasure. But as Lena delves deeper into the memory, she realizes that she is not the only one searching for it, and that the memory itself may be more than just a simple treasure map.
